data.text: And as he went out of the temple, one of his disciples saith unto him, Master, see what manner of stones and what buildings
And Jesus answering said unto him,
And as he sat upon the mount of Olives over against the temple, Peter and James and John and Andrew asked him privately,
Tell us, when shall these things be? and what
And Jesus answering them began to say,
